glottospace 0.0.113
  • Reference

Recode character columns to TRUE/FALSE

Source: R/glottoclean.R
glottorecode_logical.Rd

Recode character columns to TRUE/FALSE

glottorecode_logical(glottodata, structure, totrue = NULL, tofalse = NULL)

Arguments

glottodata

glottodata list

structure

structure table

totrue

values to recode to TRUE

tofalse

values to recode to FALSE

Examples

glottodata <- glottoget("demodata", meta = TRUE)
glottorecode_logical(glottodata, totrue = c("y", "Y", 1), tofalse = c("n", "N", 0),
structure = glottodata[["structure"]])
#> Values in binary columns (symm/asymm) recoded to TRUE/FALSE 
#>   glottocode var001 var002 var003
#> 1   yucu1253   TRUE      a  FALSE
#> 2   tani1257     NA      b   TRUE
#> 3   ticu1245   TRUE      a   TRUE
#> 4   orej1242  FALSE      b  FALSE
#> 5   nade1244  FALSE      c   TRUE
#> 6   mara1409  FALSE      a  FALSE

glottosubdata <- glottoget("demosubdata", meta = TRUE)
glottorecode_logical(glottosubdata, totrue = c("y", "Y", 1), tofalse = c("n", "N", 0),
structure = glottosubdata[["structure"]])
#> Values in binary columns (symm/asymm) recoded to TRUE/FALSE 
#>      glottosubcode var001 var002 var003
#> 1  yucu1253_a_0001   TRUE      a   TRUE
#> 2  yucu1253_a_0002  FALSE      b  FALSE
#> 3  yucu1253_a_0003   TRUE      a  FALSE
#> 4  yucu1253_a_0004  FALSE      b   TRUE
#> 5  yucu1253_a_0005   TRUE      a     NA
#> 6  yucu1253_b_0001  FALSE      b   TRUE
#> 7  yucu1253_b_0002   TRUE      a  FALSE
#> 8  yucu1253_b_0003  FALSE      b  FALSE
#> 9  yucu1253_b_0004   TRUE      a   TRUE
#> 10 yucu1253_b_0005  FALSE      b     NA
#> 11 tani1257_a_0001   TRUE      a  FALSE
#> 12 tani1257_a_0002     NA      a   TRUE
#> 13 tani1257_a_0003   TRUE      a  FALSE
#> 14 tani1257_a_0004   TRUE      b   TRUE
#> 15 tani1257_a_0005  FALSE      b  FALSE
#> 16 tani1257_b_0001   TRUE      a   TRUE
#> 17 tani1257_b_0002     NA      a  FALSE
#> 18 tani1257_b_0003   TRUE      a   TRUE
#> 19 tani1257_b_0004   TRUE      b  FALSE
#> 20 tani1257_b_0005  FALSE      b   TRUE
